File-handling utils¶

File handling utilities.

simpleutils.simplefile.get_fileobject(filename, mode, ext, prefix='')[source]¶

returns a fileobject for given input.

Parameters:
  • filename – path - str to a path on system fileobject - in which case just returned None - uses prettytime() to make
  • mode (str) –
    • mode for open
  • ext (str) –
    • added to end of filename
  • prefix (str) – added to start of filename
